attributes.action: Medically screen ALL immigrants to the UK
attributes.additional_details: There is a worrying increase in imported illness and diseases that the UK has been free from or has had under control through it's vaccination program during childhood for many years. Other countries have strict medical screenings before new immigrants are accepted into their country. Our UK government MUST adopt a strict medical assessment before acceptance into UK settlement. We CANNOT subject the indigenous population to such incurable horrific diseases such as the Ebola virus.
